trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The jaculi has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The jaculi has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spring
entries: The jaculi springs up to 30 feet in a straight line and makes a bite attack against a target within its reach. This attack has advantage if the jaculi springs at least 10 feet. If the attack hits, the bite deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.
